ygData.subject: Re: gypsy camps
ygData.msgSnippet: The only difference between fine steel and combine is that combine can hit magic only creatures.  The damage and speed I believe are the same. ...
ygData.messageBody:
The only difference between fine steel and combine is that combine can hit
magic only creatures. The damage and speed I believe are the same.


>From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
>Reply-To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
>To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] gypsy camps
>Date: Mon, 7 Jun 1999 12:56:11 -0700
>
>From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
>
>
>
>Anyone using a combine 2 handed sword yet ? What are the stats for them
>and what can you expect to hit for with it. I am outgrowing my fine steel
>2 handed sword and would like to make sure that it is worth getting a
>combine. My fine steel hits for 25Hp max.
>
